name: Custody
description: Super simple vanilla custard. FLV Coconut is not mandatory.
author: Goldfish18

reviews.text: Mixed this up without the FLV Coconut ($$$$) and it is a very good, easy to whip up custard.  Nice work.  I did add a touch of FLV Sweet Coconut for the sweetness and a little interest.
One week out and im enjoying it!  I know it will be better with more time.  I'll mix this one again!

This was a perfectly sweet thick vanilla custard. It reminds me of Velvet Couds vanilla custard. The second batch was a 100ml batch as I enjoyed the first so much. Takes at least a week till those custard notes come through properly. Enjoyed it allot.
